response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you, which I believe is worth every bit of its $8,000 value to you. Considering its exceptional quality and unique features, I would like to offer it to you at an exclusive price of $7,500. This is a special opportunity to own a product that truly exceeds expectations and brings unparalleled benefits. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 7500}
